H0.text: New Britain and New Ireland are two of the islands that make up which country. Papua

H1.text: New Britain and New Ireland are two of the islands that make up which country. Solomon Islands

H2.text: New Britain and New Ireland are two of the islands that make up which country. Vanuatu

H3.text: New Britain and New Ireland are two of the islands that make up which country. Niugini

A4.text: Papua New Guinea (PNG), officially the Independent State of Papua New Guinea, is an island country in Oceania that comprises the eastern half of the island of New Guinea and offshore islands in Melanesia, a region of the southwestern Pacific Ocean north of Australia.

A5.text: The major islands off the northeast of the mainland form along two arcs. One includes small islands near the mainland and the large island of New Britain. While New Britain is mostly not volcanic... The other island arc links Manus Island, New Hanover, New Ireland, and Bougainville.
